title: Which country has a unique education system? - Quora

response.answer_text: We considered education as a one but we dividing the education in different ways. All countries have education their education system and but the difference is the style of teaching and syllabus. This difference makes education so unique and separate. According to world education and my friend, Mr. Menachem Moscovitz opinion Finland and Japan has a unique education system. Both of the countries give education first priority and work hard on education.  They continued trying to improve their education system according to technology. It makes a big impact on students as well as teachers also as compared to other countries education system. We have to learn from Finland & Japan how to manage the education system. Education is most important for everyone and we need to respect education and learn different things as much as we can.
